original: na jñānācchūnyatā nāma kācidanyā hi vidyate /
analyzed: na jñānāt śūnyatā nāma kācid anyā hi vidyate
vivikta avyatireki tvam vivekasya yatas matam

original: dvayaśūnyam hi vijñānam anyathā na prasajyate /
analyzed: dvaya śūnyam hi vijñānam anyathā na prasajyate
dvaya asattvāt nivṛttasya dvaya ātma tva prasangataḥ
vedya vedaka sadbhāva vikalpa ādi asamāśrayaḥ
cittamātram nirābhāsam vihāraḥ buddha bhūḥ tathā
etat hi bhāṣitam buddhaiḥ bhāsante bhāṣayanti ca

original: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tvihāṣṭamī /
analyzed: cittam hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā tu iha aṣṭamī
dve bhūmayaḥ śeṣā bhūmiḥ mama ātmikā
deśyante bhūmayaḥ sapta buddhaiḥ citta vaśam gatāḥ
kāya vāc citta dauṣṭhulyam saptamyām na pravartate
aṣṭamyām āśrayaḥ tasya svapnaḥ pi asukha saṃbhavaḥ
avācyaḥ vācakaiḥ dharmaḥ kṛpayā yena deśitaḥ
namaḥ cintya prabhavāya buddhāya asaṅga buddhaye

original: 2. svabhāvena na cotpannā nirvṛtāśca na tattvataḥ /
analyzed: svabhāvena na ca utpannāḥ nirvṛtāḥ ca na tattvataḥ
yathā ākāśam tathā buddhāḥ sattvāḥ ca eva eka lakṣaṇāḥ
pārāvāram na ca utpannāḥ svabhāvena pratityajāḥ
te pi śūnyāḥ hi saṃskārāḥ sarvajña jñāna gocarāḥ   /
sarva bhāvāḥ svabhāvena pratibimba samāḥ matāḥ
śuddhāḥ śiva svabhāvāḥ ca advayāḥ tathatā samāḥ
asati ātmani ca ātma tvam kalpayitvā pṛthagjanāḥ

original: sukhaduḥkham abhijñāśca sarvam eṣāṃ ca tattvataḥ // 12 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkham abhijñāḥ ca sarvam eṣām ca tattvataḥ
ṣaṣ gatiḥ yaḥ ca saṃsāraḥ svargaḥ ca paramam sukham
narake ca mahat duḥkham yatām
abhūtām kalpanām kṛtvā pacyante naraka ādiṣu
sva doṣena eva dahyante veṇavaḥ vahninā yathā

original: 8. yathā māyā tathā sattvā viṣayān paribhuñjate //
analyzed: yathā māyā tathā sattvāḥ viṣayān paribhuñjate
māyā mayīm gatim yānti pratītya utpāda rūpiṇīm
yathā citrakaraḥ rūpam yakṣasya ati bhayaṅkaram
bibheti svayam ālikhya saṃsāre pi abudhaḥ tathā

original: 10. yathā paṅkaṃ svayaṃ kṛtvā kaścit patati bāliśaḥ /
analyzed: yathā paṅkam svayam kṛtvā kaścid patati bāliśaḥ
tathā asat kalpanā paṅke magnāḥ sattvāḥ duruttare

original: 11. abhāvaṃ bhavato dṛṣṭvā duḥkhāṃ vindati vedanām /
analyzed: abhāvam bhavataḥ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhām vindati vedanām
śaṅkā viṣeṇa bādhante viṣayāḥ vitathāḥ tathā
tān ca eva aśaraṇān dṛṣṭvā karuṇā dhīra mānasāḥ
niyojayanti saṃbodhau sattvān buddhāḥ hitaṃkarāḥ
te pi saṃbhṛta saṃbhārāḥ prāpya jñānam anuttaram
kalpanā jāla nirmuktāḥ syuḥ lokabandhavaḥ
yatas jātam anutpannam samyak sattva artha darśinaḥ
tatas śūnyam jagat dṛṣṭvā ādi madhya anta varjitam

original: 15. tena paśyanti saṃsāraṃ nirvāṇaṃ ca na cātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tena paśyanti saṃsāram nirvāṇam ca na ca ātmanaḥ
nirlepam nirvikāram ca ādi madhya anta bhāsvaram
svapna anubhūta viṣayam pratibuddhaḥ na paśyati
moha nidrā vibuddhaḥ ca saṃsāram na eva paśyati
māyām vidhāya māyavī upasaṃharate yadā

original: tadā na vidyate kiṃcid dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā // 24 //
analyzed: tadā na vidyate kiṃcid dharmāṇām sā hi dharma tā
cittamātram idam sarvam māyākāra vat utthitam

original: tataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma tato janma śubhāśubham // 25 //
analyzed: tatas śubha aśubham karma tatas janma śubha aśubham

original: 19. kalpayanti yathā lokaṃ notpannāśca svayaṃ janāḥ /
analyzed: kalpayanti yathā lokam na utpannāḥ ca svayam janāḥ

original: utpādo hi vikalpo 'yaṃ artho bāhyo na vidyate // 26 //
analyzed: utpādaḥ hi vikalpaḥ yam arthaḥ bāhyaḥ na vidyate
asvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu nitya ātma sukha saṃjñinaḥ
bhava arṇave bhramanti asmin bālāḥ moha tamaḥ vṛtāḥ
kalpanā jala pūrṇasya saṃsāra su mahā udadheḥ

original: anākramya mahāyānaṃ ko vā pāraṃ tariṣyati // 28 //
analyzed: an ākramya mahāyānam kaḥ vā pāram tariṣyati  /
mahāyāna viṃśikā kṛtiḥ ārya nāgārjuna pādānām
